abstract: Thirteen-month-old boy Edwin Perocier Jr dies of Suboxone overdose in his Bronx apartment after he apparently swallowed pills from bottle that his parents had given him to play with as a rattle.
snippet: The victim died after he apparently swallowed pills from a bottle of prescription drugs that his parents gave him to play with as a rattle.
lead_paragraph: The victim died after he apparently swallowed pills from a bottle of prescription drugs that his parents gave him to play with as a rattle.

headline.main: Baby Boy Dies; Was Given Pills as a Toy
headline.print_headline: Given Pills as Toy, Baby Dies, Police Say
headline.seo: Baby Boy Dies of Suboxone Overdose
